\begin{tcAthena}
declare blt: [Nat Nat] -> Boolean [< [int->Nat int->Nat]]

assert* blt-def := [(n < m <==> n <= m & n =/= m)]

> (eval 3 < 4)

Term: true

> (eval 3 < 2)

Term: false
\end{tcAthena}
Note that we could have also defined \smtt{blt} as follows: \smtt{(n < m <==> n <= m \& \tildels m <= n)}.
